bioconda.name: bioconductor-plgem
bioconda.summary: Detect differential expression in microarray and proteomics datasets with the Power Law Global Error Model (PLGEM)

biotools.summary: The Power Law Global Error Model has been shown to faithfully model the variance-versus-mean dependence that exists in a variety of genome-wide datasets, including microarray and proteomics data. Its use has been shown to improve the detection of differentially expressed genes or proteins in these datasets.

bioschemas.name: plgem
